Title: Relates to requiring the return of all or a part of the financial assistance provided for certain projects
Summary: Requires the return of all or a part of the financial assistance provided for a project where the project has material shortfalls or material violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง874, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring the return of all or a part of the financial assistance provided for a project where the project has material shortfalls or material violations
